EDR.MC.summary: eDreams ODIGEO S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an online travel company in Europe. It offers its products and services under the eDreams, Go Voyages, Opodo, Travellink, and Liligo brands. The company also provides marketing, admin and IT consulting, and metasearch services, as well as creates audiences for optimizing online advertising campaigns. Its customers access the deals in regular flights, low-cost airlines, hotels, cruises, car rental, dynamic packages, holiday packages, and travel insurance. eDreams ODIGEO S.A. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.
